DATA.title: The Organizer (Data)
DATA.summary: A systematic architect who creates order through facts and records.

traits.desc: You show excellent talent in handling information, records, and numbers. Even in chaotic situations, you have the ability to find rules and build systems to create stability. You trust facts over feelings and play a key role in organizational efficiency through your thoroughness and diligence.
traits.energy: Your energy comes from the 'Past' and 'Accumulated Data'. You rely on records and experiences to reduce uncertainty in the present and design stable structures.

role_models.name: Warren Buffett
role_models.desc: Investment genius known for analyzing financial records

role_models.name: Sherlock Holmes
role_models.desc: Detective who pieces together small data points to find the truth

DATA.activity_guide: Try keeping a detailed journal of your expenses or planning a trip using a spreadsheet.

IDEA.title: The Innovator (Idea)
IDEA.summary: A creative explorer who draws the future with new thoughts and imagination.

traits.desc: You are strongly attracted to internal activities involving abstract concepts, theories, and new ways of expression. You see unique perspectives that others miss and have the potential to break molds and lead innovation.
traits.energy: Your energy comes from the 'Future'. Instead of settling for reality, you are most passionate when imagining tomorrow's possibilities and asking 'What if?'.

role_models.name: J.K. Rowling
role_models.desc: Author who captivated the world with pure imagination

role_models.name: Albert Einstein
role_models.desc: Scientist who revealed the universe's principles through thought experiments

IDEA.activity_guide: Watch SF movies to imagine the future, or keep an idea notebook.

PEOPLE.title: The Supporter (People)
PEOPLE.summary: A warm helper who grows together with others through communication and empathy.

traits.desc: You shine in activities that involve interacting with, helping, educating, or persuading others. With your excellent ability to read emotions, you bring vitality to organizations and communities.
traits.energy: Your energy stays in the 'Present' and 'Relationships'. The connection, conversation, and emotional exchange with people right now are your strongest driving forces.

role_models.name: Oprah Winfrey
role_models.desc: Talk show host who heals hearts through empathy and communication

role_models.name: Mother Teresa
role_models.desc: A symbol of selfless service and love for humanity

PEOPLE.activity_guide: Participate in volunteer work or become a peer counselor for friends.

THING.title: The Maker (Thing)
THING.summary: A practical artisan who creates tangible results using tools and technology.

traits.desc: You prefer working with machines, tools, and materials. You enjoy showing results through action rather than words and feel a high sense of achievement when you produce something tangible.
traits.energy: Your energy focuses on 'Completion' and 'Results'. You get the most energy when you see a finished product right in front of you.

role_models.name: Gordon Ramsay
role_models.desc: Star chef who commands the kitchen for the best dishes

role_models.name: Michael Jordan
role_models.desc: Athlete who created results through physical training and skill

THING.activity_guide: Try hobbies like model building, cooking, or flying drones.

DATA_PEOPLE.title: The Administrator
DATA_PEOPLE.summary: A leader who manages people within a systematic framework.

traits.desc: You possess the ability to manage and persuade people (People) while adhering to rules and procedures (Data). You excel at collaborating with others to achieve goals in a structured environment.
traits.energy: You leverage 'Stable Systems (Past)' to lead 'People (Present)'. You respect tradition and discipline while building current teamwork.

role_models.name: Ban Ki-moon
role_models.desc: Former UN Secretary-General who coordinated peace within protocols

DATA_PEOPLE.activity_guide: Become a club officer or treasurer to set rules and lead meetings.

DATA_THING.title: The Researcher
DATA_THING.summary: An investigator who pursues perfection by combining precise data and technology.

traits.desc: You excel at analyzing factual information (Data) using precise tools or technology (Thing). You explore phenomena based on objective facts and value logic and empirical evidence over emotion.
traits.energy: You use 'Past Data' to produce 'Current Results'. You are immersed when solving problems using accumulated knowledge.

role_models.name: Bill Gates
role_models.desc: Founder of Microsoft who combined coding (Thing) with business data (Data)

DATA_THING.activity_guide: Learn coding or assemble science kits to understand principles.

IDEA_PEOPLE.title: The Inspirer
IDEA_PEOPLE.summary: An inspiring educator who plants dreams and visions in people.

traits.desc: You are passionate about moving people's hearts and creating change (People) through creative thoughts (Idea). You go beyond transferring knowledge to inspiring others and unlocking their potential.
traits.energy: You plant a 'Vision of the Future' in 'People of the Present'. You lead people towards a hopeful tomorrow.

role_models.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
role_models.desc: Leader who moved the world with a vision (Idea) and speech

IDEA_PEOPLE.activity_guide: Join a debate club or share your thoughts on a blog or YouTube.

IDEA_THING.title: The Pioneer
IDEA_THING.summary: A creative inventor who realizes new ideas with concrete technology.

traits.desc: You are a convergence talent who realizes unique ideas (Idea) into actual working objects or technology (Thing). You have both engineering and artistic senses to turn abstract imagination into reality.
traits.energy: You turn 'Future Imagination' into 'Real Results'. You create what others only dream of.

role_models.name: Steve Jobs
role_models.desc: Innovator who combined humanities (Idea) with technology (Thing)

role_models.name: Elon Musk
role_models.desc: Visionary turning sci-fi ideas into real rockets and cars

IDEA_THING.activity_guide: Learn 3D printing or develop your own cooking recipe.

CENTER.title: The Balancer
CENTER.summary: A balanced talent who adapts flexibly to any situation.

traits.desc: You have balanced interests and capabilities in all areas: Data, Ideas, People, and Things. This means you have the potential to integrate diverse fields or perform necessary roles flexibly depending on the situation.
traits.energy: You freely cross the flow of time: Past, Present, and Future. Your flexibility is your greatest weapon.

role_models.name: Leonardo da Vinci
role_models.desc: The ultimate polymath crossing art, science, and technology

role_models.name: Jeff Bezos
role_models.desc: Founder of Amazon who integrated technology, logistics, and customer service

CENTER.activity_guide: Read books in various fields and experience diverse club activities.
